model.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.player.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, GameChar

    public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameChar, java.io.Serializable
    This class defines the interface of interest to clients and maintains an instance of a PlayerState subclass that defines the current state.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
